qas.question: What is professional wrestling abbreviated as?
What are a couple of styles of combat based on?
Who are live events held by?

answers.text: an athletic form of entertainment based on a portrayal of a combat sport

qas.question: What kind of style does wrestling show?

answers.text: it portrays a unique style of combat based on a combination of adopted styles, which include classical wrestling

context: Professional wrestling (colloquially abbreviated to <a0_0>pro wrestling<a0_0/> or wrestling) is <a3_0>an athletic form of entertainment based on a portrayal of a combat sport<a3_0/>. Taking the form of live events held by <a2_0>touring promotions<a2_0/>, <a4_0>it portrays a unique style of combat based on a combination of adopted styles, which include <a1_0>classical wrestling<a4_0/>, catch wrestling<a1_0/> and various forms of martial arts, as well as an innovative style based on grappling (holds/throws), striking, and aerialism. Various forms of weaponry are sometimes used.
